Race.SpecificTitle: West Vernon Parish Waterworks District -- 10 Mills Continuation - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
West Vernon Parish Waterworks District Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall West Vernon Parish Waterworks District, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $86,650 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the waterworks system of the District?
